summary: Charlie investigates murders connected with insurance fraud. This one is set in San Francisco's Chinatown.
cast: Sidney Toler|Mantan Moreland|Victor Sen Yung|Tanis Chandler|John Gallaudet|Paul Bryar|Bruce Kellogg|Al Bridge|Mary Gordon|Dorothy Granger|Jack Norton|George Eldredge|Tyra Vaughn|Lyle Latell|Mira McKinney|Harry Depp|Gladys Blake|Kit Carson|George Chan|Jim Dugan|Tom Ferrandini|J.C. Fowler|Louise Franklin|Raoul Freeman|Doris Fulton|Joe Gilbert|John Hamilton|George Hoagland|Charles Jordan|James B. Leong|Frank Mayo|Jack Mower|Bob Reeves|Loretta Russell|Norman Stevans|Brick Sullivan
director: Director: Terry O. Morse (as Terry Morse)
title: Shadows Over Chinatown
